rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Welcoming space with built-in storage and natural light from a West-facing window, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area featuring Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and metallic accents; large West-facing windows provide abundant natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-concept dining space adjoining the living room with a view of the garden. Emphasis on natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed in Art Deco style with streamlined cabinetry and reflective surfaces to enhance light distribution. Windows ensure cross-ventilation.

rooms.name: Washroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Compact washroom for guests with minimal fixtures and natural ventilation design.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area including storage and laundry space with adequate lighting. Considered for functionality and adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: Large West-facing windows in living room and dining areas maximizing natural light and ventilation.
Main entrance door designed with Art Deco style detailing, ensuring proper Vastu alignment for auspicious entry.
